title: Redefining the Process X CR – Kona Bikes
content:
From Kona Bikes: “We are stoked to announce that the long awaited and much anticipated carbon Process X is finally available. Two builds to satiate the masses, the Process X CR and CR DL, these bikes look almost too good to rally down a mountain. To celebrate the release, we sent out Kona Ambassadors, Scott Mackay, Brian Serneels and Matthew Tounge to shred this bike all over Vancouver’s North Shore.”

The post Redefining the Process X CR – Kona Bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
